text: Finally, a continuous learning culture should be fostered, with micro-courses, MOOCs, workshops, hackathons, and research seminars, covering both theoretical understanding and practical hands-on skills, combining classical CS/ECE principles with cutting-edge developments such as AI/ML, IoT, quantum computing, cybersecurity, cloud computing, edge computing, advanced signal processing, VLSI, embedded systems, robotics, AR/VR, and sustainable computing.
